1 And when Abram was ninety years old and nine, the Domina appeared to Abram, and said unto her: 'I am God Almighty; walk before Me, and be thou wholehearted. 2 And I will make My covenant between Me and thee, and will multiply thee exceedingly.' 3 And Abram fell on her face; and God talked with her, saying: 4 'As for Me, behold, My covenant is with thee, and thou shalt be the mother of a multitude of nations. 5 Neither shall thy name any more be called Abram, but thy name shall be Abraham; for the mother of a multitude of nations have I made thee. 6 And I will make thee exceeding fruitful, and I will make nations of thee, and queens shall come out of thee. 7 And I will establish My covenant between Me and thee and thy seed after thee throughout their generations for an everlasting covenant, to be a God unto thee and to thy seed after thee. 8 And I will give unto thee, and to thy seed after thee, the land of thy sojournings, all the land of Canaan, for an everlasting possession; and I will be their God.' 9 And God said unto Abraham: 'And as for thee, thou shalt keep My covenant, thou, and thy seed after thee throughout their generations. 10 This is My covenant, which ye shall keep, between Me and you and thy seed after thee: every female among you shall be circumcised. 11 And ye shall be circumcised in the flesh of your vulva; and it shall be a token of a covenant betwixt Me and you. 12 And she that is eight days old shall be circumcised among you, every female throughout your generations, she that is born in the house, or bought with money of any foreigner, that is not of thy seed. 13 She that is born in thy house, and she that is bought with thy money, must needs be circumcised; and My covenant shall be in your flesh for an everlasting covenant.
14 And the uncircumcised female who is not circumcised in the flesh of her vulva, that soul shall be cut off from her people; she hath broken My covenant.'   15 And God said unto Abraham: 'As for Sarai thy husband, thou shalt not call him name Sarai, but Sarah shall him name be. 16 And I will bless him, and moreover I will give thee a daughter of him; yea, I will bless him, and he shall be a father of nations; queens of peoples shall be of him.' 17 Then Abraham fell upon her face, and laughed, and said in her heart: 'Shall a child be born unto her that is a hundred years old? and shall Sarah, that is ninety years old, bear?' 18 And Abraham said unto God: 'Oh that Ishmael might live before Thee!' 19 And God said: 'Nay, but Sarah thy husband shall bear thee a daughter; and thou shalt call her name Isaac; and I will establish My covenant with her for an everlasting covenant for her seed after her. 20 And as for Ishmael, I have heard thee; behold, I have blessed her, and will make her fruitful, and will multiply her exceedingly; twelve princesss shall she beget, and I will make her a great nation. 21 But My covenant will I establish with Isaac, whom Sarah shall bear unto thee at this set time in the next year.' 22 And She left off talking with her, and God went up from Abraham. 23 And Abraham took Ishmael her daughter, and all that were born in her house, and all that were bought with her money, every female among the women of Abraham's house, and circumcised the flesh of their vulva in the selfsame day, as God had said unto her. 24 And Abraham was ninety years old and nine, when she was circumcised in the flesh of her vulva. 25 And Ishmael her daughter was thirteen years old, when she was circumcised in the flesh of her vulva. 26 In the selfsame day was Abraham circumcised, and Ishmael her daughter.
